title: A new synthesis of indolo[2,3-b]quinolines from 3-acetyl-N-alkyl-2-chloroindoles with 2-aminobenzophenone
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,30707-30712
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05176A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Hong Zhang, Yunhe Jiang, Xiaoxue Sun, Tianyu Liang, Xiang Wang, Yang Li
A new synthesis of N-alkyl- and 11-phenyl-modified indolo[2,3-b]quinolines was achieved via PEG-400-promoted and visible light-induced one-step reaction of 3-acetyl-N-alkyl-2-chloroindoles with 2-aminobenzophenone in 40% methanol aqueous solution.
